text:
oh wow :wave:  I had no idea there was an <#C9F9C5CB0|economics> channel! that’s good news! I just taught the first session of my computational econ course today, check it out! Borrowing and remixing some of the coolest stuff in the julia-sphere out there! (hat tipping have this channel <@U6CJRSR63> <@U7Z4938R3>)
(comments welcome! :wink:) <https://floswald.github.io/NumericalMethods/>

text: Good to see you're still around Julia :slightly_smiling_face: I remember being CC on an e-mail correspondence where my previous employer tried to convert you to the dark side and work on his Python project ;)

elements.text: Good to see you're still around Julia
I remember being CC on an e-mail correspondence where my previous employer tried to convert you to the dark side and work on his Python project ;)

text: oh yeah? never got that email! :smiling_imp: the gods were on my side

elements.text: oh yeah? never got that email!
the gods were on my side

text: You did, but I misremembered his wording. He never asked your to participate in HARK, but I know from behind the scenes that he wanted you to jump ship and leave Julia :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: You did, but I misremembered his wording. He never asked your to participate in HARK, but I know from behind the scenes that he wanted you to jump ship and leave Julia
E-mails are from June 2019

text: I see you're quoting Che-Lin.. Very sad that he left us all so soon.

elements.text: I see you're quoting Che-Lin.. Very sad that he left us all so soon.

text: The link to his website isn't working though

elements.text: The link to his website isn't working though
oh! need to fix, thanks.

text: This course looks awesome <@U7X7BLQSE>! I'm excited to see how you do the MPEC lecture

elements.text: This course looks awesome
! I'm excited to see how you do the MPEC lecture

text: If you replicate the bus model without including the comment my old advisor is going to have a melt down :laughing: I can't count the number of times I've heard about those benchmarks

elements.text: If you replicate the bus model without including the comment my old advisor is going to have a melt down
I can't count the number of times I've heard about those benchmarks
which comment?
the newton comment

text: The issue is basically that they use VFI instead of Newton's method or the hybrid method Rust originally used

elements.text: The issue is basically that they use VFI instead of Newton's method or the hybrid method Rust originally used

text:

anyways, using that material quite a lot. but MPEC will be _much_ more fun in JuMP :wink:
